src:
Watch Live: Donald Trump Hosts MAGA Rally in Kentucky | Breitbart
President Donald Trump will host a campaign rally in Kentucky on Monday night.
04 Nov 2019, 23:48 by Charlie Spiering

Trump is scheduled to speak 7:00 p.m EST.

The president is working to boost Republican Kentucky Governor Matt Bevin who faces a close election on Tuesday.

Video courtesy of Right Side Broadcasting Network.
